title: AgentFlow by Shakudo vs Salesforce Agentforce: Which agent platforms Tool is Better in 2026?
metaDescription: Compare AgentFlow by Shakudo vs Salesforce Agentforce. See pricing, features, pros & cons to choose the best agent platforms tool for your needs in 2026.
introduction: Choosing between AgentFlow by Shakudo and Salesforce Agentforce for your agent platforms needs? Both are popular tools in the AI space, but they have different strengths, pricing models, and use cases. This comprehensive comparison breaks down the key differences to help you make an informed decision.

sections.title: Overview: AgentFlow by Shakudo vs Salesforce Agentforce
paragraphs: AgentFlow by Shakudo is AgentFlow is a comprehensive platform for building, deploying, and managing autonomous AI agents at enterprise scale. It provides a visual workflow builder, pre-built agent templates, and production-grade infrastructure for running complex multi-agent systems. Its key differentiator is the ability to orchestrate multiple specialized agents working together, with built-in monitoring, version control, and compliance tools for regulated industries.. It's known for agent-orchestration, enterprise-ai, multi-agent.

Salesforce Agentforce, on the other hand, is Salesforce Agentforce is an enterprise-grade platform for building and deploying autonomous AI agents that can execute complex business workflows. It is powered by the proprietary Atlas Reasoning Engine, enabling agents to reason, plan, and act across Salesforce data and external systems to automate tasks like customer service, sales operations, and IT support. It uniquely targets large enterprises seeking to scale AI-driven process automation with trust, security, and deep integration into the Salesforce ecosystem.. Users choose it for enterprise-ai, autonomous-agents, workflow-automation.

sections.title: Pricing Comparison
paragraphs: When it comes to value for money, consider your specific use case and team size.

sections.title: Features & Capabilities
paragraphs: AgentFlow by Shakudo excels in: Visual workflow builder for multi-agent orchestration, Pre-built agent templates for common business tasks, Production-grade infrastructure with auto-scaling. This makes it ideal for teams that need agent-orchestration.

Salesforce Agentforce stands out with: Atlas Reasoning Engine for multi-step planning and decision-making, Pre-built agent templates for service, sales, and IT use cases, Secure, governed access to Salesforce Data Cloud and CRM records. It's particularly strong for users focused on enterprise-ai.

sections.title: Use Cases: When to Choose Each Tool
paragraphs: Choose AgentFlow by Shakudo if: You need agent-orchestration, work with enterprise-ai, or require flexible pricing.
Choose Salesforce Agentforce if: You prioritize enterprise-ai, work in autonomous-agents, or prefer their pricing model.

sections.title: Pros & Cons
paragraphs: AgentFlow by Shakudo Pros: Verified platform, Highly rated (4.6/5), Extensive feature set.
AgentFlow by Shakudo Cons: Paid plans may be needed for full features.
Salesforce Agentforce Pros: Verified platform, Featured tool, Highly rated (4.6/5), Comprehensive features.
Salesforce Agentforce Cons: May have feature limitations.

verdict: Both AgentFlow by Shakudo and Salesforce Agentforce are solid choices for agent platforms. Your choice depends on your specific requirements: AgentFlow by Shakudo is better for agent-orchestration, while Salesforce Agentforce excels at enterprise-ai. Consider trying both with their free tiers or trials to see which fits your workflow better.
